description: arched pendant; the main body is formed of two single eyed animals (with human profile) interlocking each other into a single band; the pendant ends in an open hook form; incised design on both sides providing the general features of the creature (the design on the back is not clear); grey-ivory jade; incrusted; traces of red pigment
medium: Ivory-grey jade with traces of red pigment
title: Huang Crescent Shaped Pendant
